thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 16 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Reliance Nippon Life Asset Management Dec-Qtr Consol Net Profit Rises

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Reliance Nippon Life Asset Management Dec-Qtr Consol Net Profit Rises

organizations.name: reliance nippon life asset management ltd

text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) - Reliance Nippon Life Asset Management Ltd :
* SAYS DECLARED INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 5 RUPEES PER EQUITY SHARE
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL NET PROFIT 1.30 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT 1.04 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 4.09 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 3.28 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* SAYS AS ON DEC 31, AUMS WERE AT 3.88 TRLN RUPEES ‍​ Source text: bit.ly/2EL7O1i Further company coverage:
